tagalong.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something that is attached to and pulled behind something else
tagalong.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The tagalong attaches to an adult’s bicycle.
tagalong.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who goes somewhere with someone else
tagalong.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We were tagalongs on my parents’ vacations.
